scripts.dev: zx scripts/compile-mitosis.mjs vue "src/components/**/*.tsx" && concurrently --kill-others "npm run mitosis:watch" "npm run tailwind:watch"
scripts.build: npm run mitosis:build && npm run tailwind:build && npm run esbuild:jsx && rm -rf components/*.jsx
scripts.mitosis:watch: chokidar "src/components/**/*.tsx" -c "if [ '{event}' = 'change' ] || [ '{event}' = 'add' ]; then zx scripts/compile-mitosis.mjs vue {path}; fi;"
